title: MVP-0: bundle outputs (overlay + non-placeholder report)

runbooks.notes: No runbook changes required for this intent.

summary: Produce a real, human-useful overlay.mp4 for MVP-0 (players + teams + confidence) inside the output bundle.
Replace placeholder report.html with a minimal but truthful report explaining confidence and known gaps.
non_goals: Production-grade design system; MVP report is utilitarian.
success_criteria: A bundle run produces a playable overlay.mp4 with player tracks and team labels when evidence exists.
report.html is non-placeholder and includes at minimum: counts, confidence summary, and diagnostics pointers.
Overlay/report rendering remains deterministic and trust-first (no fabricated markers).

work_packages.title: Overlay
items: TASK-OVERLAY-PLAYERS-MVP-001 Extend overlay rendering to include players + team + confidence cues.
TASK-OVERLAY-BACKEND-ROBUSTNESS-MVP-001 Ensure overlay can render text reliably across backends.

work_packages.title: Reports and placeholders
items: TASK-REPORT-HTML-MVP-001 Generate a minimal non-placeholder report.html explaining confidence and gaps.
